name: Swarm of Swamp Slirghs
description: Large swamp-dwelling elemental composed of slirghs, capable of maneuvering through water and creating an effective offensive presence.
memorable: Can teleport through water, creating surprises in combat and dealing significant poison damage.
goals: To inhabit wetlands and ambush unsuspecting creatures that venture too close.
relations: May be found in the company of other elemental creatures or lurking in the swamps.
strengths: Immunity to poison and a variety of conditions, along with the ability to teleport in water.
weaknesses: Low armor class and predictable strategies due to low intelligence and charisma.
attacks: Can bite for piercing and poison damage, and spit swamp sludge for ranged poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Puddle Jump allows for strategic teleportation through water, enhancing mobility in combat.
senses: Possesses tremorsense up to 60 feet, enhancing its awareness of nearby creatures.
skills: Skilled in perception with a +2 bonus, improving its ability to detect hidden threats.
additional_information: Can occupy the same space as other creatures.
Poisoned creatures near the swarm may suffer debilitating effects.
Has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Effective at ambushing enemies in aquatic environments.
The swarm's combat effectiveness declines as its hit points drop.
test_queries: swamp elemental that teleports through water
poisonous swamp monster with teleporting ability
large creature that inflicts damage in water
swarm of creatures dealing poison damage
